keydir.description: Directory to read private keys from. Defaults to $EJSON_KEYDIR or /opt/ejson/keys if not set.

public_key.description: The public key to use for encrypting the data.

private_key.description: The private part of the key pair, for decrypting the ejson file.

public_key.description: The public part of the key pair, for embedding into the ejson file.

data.description: Decrypted contents of ejson file. Use jsondecode to get an object from the JSON blob.

map.description: Mapping of decrypted keys to values, only top-level string values are included. The public key is stripped out and underscore prefixes are removed.

private_key.description: Private key to use for decryption. The provider-level config keydir is used to find a key by default.

block.description: Decrypt an ejson file and access its contents.
